That's right, but in that GTA2 version some languages (French, German and Italian) aren't included! In this torrent they are, but this is a older version. That people, who want they prefered language, can do following:
Install this version (torrent) to the folder "GTA2_temp" and install from rockstar to "GTA2". Copy following files from "GTA2_temp\data" to folder "GTA2":
 bob_f.gtx, bob_g.gtx, bob_i.gtx, f.gtx, g.gtx, i.gtx
Than uninstall "GTA2_temp".
